entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 9.
